document.full_text: research in motion  shares neared a two-year low on monday after the blackberry maker said it had recalled about 1,000 of its playbook tablet computers due to an operating system flaw.
document.title: rim nears 2-year low after recalling some playbooks
lines_and_colors: research in motion  shares neared a two-year low on monday after the blackberry maker said it had recalled about 1,000 of its playbook tablet computers due to an operating system flaw.
